name: artsOutOfThinAir
title: 无中生有(Art's Out of thin air)（娱乐作弊性质(Entertainment cheat nature)）
author: aspd199
description:
通过向传送带发送信号，传送带表面将产生与信号传送器相同的物品。！
在传送带的出口放置常量运算器，能让传送带表面的物品消失！

By sending a signal to the conveyor, the conveyor surface will produce the same item as the signal transmitter! 
Place a constant-combinator at the exit of the belt to let the surface item of the conveyor disappear!
